homePage.title: Summarize PDF, Wiki link and Text with Sumify
homePage.description: An AI-powered summarization tool that supports both Thai and English. Simply paste a Wikipedia URL or upload a PDF file, and the system will generate a concise, easy-to-understand summary‚Äîsaving you time and effort in reading!

homePage.contentFeature1: Summarize PDFs, Wikipedia links, and plain text

homePage.contentFeature3: Save time by reading only key points
